mapper.select: select qna_no as qnaNo, qna_title as qnaTitle, qna_content as qnaContent, qna_userid as qnaUserid, qna_datetime as qnaDatetime from qna_board order by qna_no desc

select qna_no as qnaNo, qna_title as qnaTitle, qna_content as qnaContent, qna_userid as qnaUserid, qna_datetime as qnaDatetime, reply_userid as replyUserid, reply_content as replyContent from qna_board where qna_no = #{qnaNo}
mapper.insert: insert into qna_board( qna_title, qna_content, qna_userid, qna_datetime, qna_userno ) values ( #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContent}, #{qnaUserid}, now(), (select no from members where userId = #{qnaUserid}) )
